name: Tamaaas Messenger
description: Tamaaas Messenger is a FREE messaging app available for Android smartphones. Tamaaas uses your phones Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/ EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message, call, and share stories with friends and family. Switch from SMS to the simple and secure Tamaaas Messenger so you can send and receive messages, calls, photos, video, video calls, group calls, Voice Messages, and share Stories with your friends and family.  WHY USE Tamaaas:  * FREE CALLS: Call your friends and family for free with Tamaaas Calling, even if theyre in another country. Tamaaas calls uses your phones Internet connection rather than your cellular plans voice minutes. Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.  * GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily connect with your friends and family.  *VIDEO CHAT: With Tamaaas Video call you can chat and share your screen with up to 4 users. Group video calls made simple and easy.   *SHARE STORIES: Tamaaas Stories lets you post images and videos that your contacts can see for 24hrs.  *EXPLORE PAGE: Tamaaas Explore page lets you post images and videos to your feed so your contacts can like and comment.  * QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is quickly and easily synced to App through an encrypted connection. No need to add hard-to-remember usernames or numbers.  *NO USERNAMES AND PINS  *NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES  *MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, and Voice Messages   Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.  Were always excited to hear from you. If you have feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at: info@tamaaas.com  ** Tamaaas is a telephone communication app, so iPod and iPad are not supported devices.
